title: Ranked Rewards
body:
Hey guys,
I've been wondering since the season has already ended when are the ranked rewards coming out? If anyone knows the exact date or a estimate please let me know in the comments :P

hehexd

replies.body: As stated on the [End-Of-Season Information](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360010365913) Support Page, the plan is to have all ranked rewards out by the 12th of December. Due to the scale of the effort, no one will be receiving their rewards just yet, and even when they start going out it will likely be "staggered" with some players receiving their rewards before others. If you haven't received anything by the 12/13th of December (and believe you were eligible), you should submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "2018 Season Ranked and Honor rewards" option).
Within 2 weeks of the end of the season, they said. There are millions of accounts after all (granted not all play Ranked seriously enough - or at all - to get Silver+ with decent Honour).
